Room.Name: Alturis Road
Room.LongDescription: You are on Alturis Road, between the Cathedral and the Hanging Gardens. The Cathedral is run by an order of monks who believe they must forever cover their eyes to simulate blindness, and thus approach the attainment of knowledge without being corrupted by worldly attractions. They once had many gods who resided in the Cathedral whom they believe taught them this strange behaviour, but now there is only the Oracle remaining.
